statements: DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 1 AND role = 'admin';
DELETE FROM users WHERE role = 'user' AND last_login < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' OR (role = 'user' AND last_login < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' AND user_role = 'admin';
